sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SMGlobal</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SMGlobal</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SMGlobal = Class.create();
SMGlobal.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    isPwd2Field: function() {
		var table = this.getParameter("sysparm_table");
		var column = this.getParameter("sysparm_column");
		return this.isPwd2FieldHelper(table, column);
	},
	
	isPwd2FieldHelper: function(table, column) {
		var tableUtil = new TableUtils(table);
		var tableArr = j2js(tableUtil.getTables());
		
		var gr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_dictionary");
		gr.addQuery("name" , "IN" , tableArr);
		gr.addQuery("element", column);
		gr.query();
		
		if (gr.next() && gr.getValue("internal_type") == "password2")
			return true;
		return false;
	},
	type: 'SMGlobal'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-05-10 16:24:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>660a3bba77db0110d21bd84b8c5a99f0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SMGlobal</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Secrets Management" source="com.glide.sm.global">b0883ca03cf1311068bcf327dfe37f4d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_660a3bba77db0110d21bd84b8c5a99f0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-12 00:45:11</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
